新的血栓炎在芯片上模型可能会彻底改变有害血凝块的治疗血块与威胁生命的疾病有关，例如败血症，镰状细胞疾病，心脏病发作和中风。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-thromboinflammation-on-a-a-chip-model-model-may-revolution-reatment-treatment-of Harmful-blood-clots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-thromboinflammation-on-a-a-chip-model-model-may-revolution-reatment-treatment-harmful-blood-clots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= edec070d-c2f0-405A-980DA-980D-1FC4AB742044 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 15:29:43 -0400 New thromboinflammation-on-a-chip model may revolutionize treatment of harmful blood clots
KFF健康新闻“什么健康？”：美国健康获得了粉红色的单张卫生与公共服务部本周接受了前所未有的清除，因为美国国立卫生研究院，FDA，FDA，疾病控制和预防中心以及整个部门的其他机构的成千上万员工被开除，送上行政休假，或者在新墨西哥州，MontaNa，Alask和Alask Alask和Alask Alask和Alask的远处印度卫生服务设施中转让或提供了转让。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-merican-merican-health-gets-a-pink-a-pink-slip.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/kff-health-news-what-what-the-health-the-health-merican-health-gets-a-a-a-a-pink-slip.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41EEDC8B-E9EC-4AC2-BAD4-F77294B709C8 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 15:17:36 -0400 KFF Health News' 'What the Health?': American health gets a pink slip
研究阐明了主要癌症基因如何影响PARP抑制剂的成功NYU Langone Health的科学家领导的一项研究阐明了主要的癌症基因BRCA2如何确定哪些癌细胞可以被称为PARP抑制剂的一类精密癌症药物杀死。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-sheds-light-on-how-major-major-cancer-gene-gene-influences-the-success-success-of-parp unibitors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-sheds-light-on-how-major-cancer-gene-gene-gene-influences-the-success-success-of-parp unibitors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=368CD819-3B68-4995-AA99-8948C2E78B45 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 15:14:21 -0400 Study sheds light on how major cancer gene influences the success of PARP inhibitors

研究揭示了女性激素如何触发阿片类药物的产生疼痛抑制科学家发现了一种新机制，该机制通过免疫细胞起作用，并指出了一种治疗慢性疼痛的不同方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-reveals-how-female-female-hormones-trigger-trigger-prigger-prododuction-for-pain-suppression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/study-reveals-how-female-female-hormones--trigger-prigger-opioid-production-for-pain-suppression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56654CCE-6C94-44D0-804E-E2DEDE98B4D5 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:55:16 -0400 Study reveals how female hormones trigger opioid production for pain suppression
与癌症幸存者死亡率降低有关的健康生活方式2022年，美国癌症协会（ACS）更新了其针对癌症幸存者的营养和活动指南，建议他们避免肥胖，保持身体活跃，吃健康的饮食并限制酒精摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/healthy-lifestyle-linked-to-lown-to-lower-mortality-mortality-incancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/healthy-lifestyle-linked-to-lown-to-lower-mortality-mortality-incancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00E1080C-871D-44E3-B209-9DA0832B520B Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:43:26 -0400 Healthy lifestyle linked to lower mortality in cancer survivors
新的最先进的癌症治疗中心在纽波特海滩开业USC Norris综合癌症中心是USC的Keck Medicine的一部分，已在4590 MacArthur Blvd开设了USC的Keck Medicine - Newport Beach辐射肿瘤学和成像，这是一个最先进的辐射肿瘤学和成像中心。在纽波特海滩。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-State-of-the-the-art-cancer-treatment-center-center-opens-opens-in-newport-beach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/new-State-of-the-the-art-cancer-warternment-center-center-opens-opens-in-newport-newport-beach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3422A003-F37C-4F0E-B7AC-718372B39CD9 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:36:23 -0400 New state-of-the-art cancer treatment center opens in Newport Beach
OICR资金五个创新的癌症药物发现项目安大略省癌症研究所（OICR）宣布支持五个安大略省研究团队，致力于开发下一代的药物，这些药物更有效地杀死肿瘤，造成更少的副作用并降低癌症会恢复的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/oicr-funds-funds-five-innovative-cancer-drug-discovery-projects.aspxs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/oicr-funds-funds-five-innovative-cancer-drug-discovery-projects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8C535D21-51-47DB-A285-285-210EE6A59238 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:16:57 -0400 OICR funds five innovative cancer drug discovery projects
临床试验证明了针对儿童致命脑肿瘤的靶向治疗方法的安全性据报道，一项I期临床试验表明，在称为弥漫性内在蓬托胶质瘤（DIPG）的儿童中治疗致命脑肿瘤的有针对性方法是安全的，据报道，据报道，Weill Cornell Medicine和纪念Sloan Kettering癌症中心的研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/clinical-clinical-trial-dymstrates-safety-safety-safety-of-targeted-warteatment-warterment-parkacher-for-for--------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/clinical-clinical-trial-dymstrates-safety-safety-safety-of-targeted-warteatment-warteatment-warterment-for-for-for-deadly-brain-brain-teadly-brain-in-rumor-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89Edfc0d-8d09-4bea-a710-089e80b844ab7 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 14:09:25 -0400 Clinical trial demonstrates safety of targeted treatment approach for deadly brain tumor in children
美国医师学院宣布$ 260,000的赠款，以促进公平的肥胖症护理今天，美国医师学院（ACP）宣布，已授予总共26万美元的赠款，以支持应对肥胖症护理股权挑战的地区计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/american-college-of-physicians-physicians-physicians-2426000000-in-in-in-in-in-in-Grants-to-Advance-advance-aidvance-equietable-equietable-obesity-obesity-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250403/american-college-of-physicians-physicians-physicians-2426000000-in-in-in-in-in-in-Grants-to-Advance-Advance-aidvance-equietable-equietable-equietable-equietabil-obesity-care-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=070d6713-adf3-4737-865b-e275222f8c561 Thu, 03 Apr 2025 13:56:00 -0400 American College of Physicians announces $260,000 in grants to advance equitable obesity care
